title: Minami-ke Betsubara
alternative_title: みなみけ べつばら
description: Valentine's Day is approaching: Hosaka is still trying to express his love to Haruka by cooking, cross-dressing Mako-chan fears to be found out, Kana-"sensei" teaches the other girls how to "win" Valentine's Day, andFujioka is desperately trying to receive Kana's chocolate.
